figure_1: Prevalence of melanoma (A) and non-melanoma skin cancer (B) in five continents with the 1-year, 3-year, and 5-year analyses based on data from GLOBALCAN 2022.
figure_2: Correlations between HDI and age-standardized morbidity and mortality in non-melanoma skin cancer (A) and melanoma of skin (B) based on data from GLOBALCAN 2022. The horizontal axis of the graph denotes the HDI levels. ASIR: Age-standardized incidence rates; ASMR: Age-standardized mortality rates; HDI: Human Development Index.
